Name: Spacky's Nightshift
About the game: Your friend gets in touch with you, telling you about an abandoned restaurant closeby. He offers you his camcorder to take some footage of what's inside. Survive inside the restaurant, then venture down into the basement. -First person controls -Storyline -Different tasks -Multiple levels -Subtitles
